name: Not Another Princess and Dragon Story
name_original: Not Another Princess and Dragon Story
description:
Game for The Out of Hibernation Game Jam

07/02/2021 - 07/04/2021

By thecatinbox

----------

Controls: 

Space - Start Game/Dialogue/Jump 

Left/Right Arrow key - Move 

F4 - Full Screen 

F2 - Reset the game 

----------

Enjoy!
